title: A classic sponge cake (with passion fruit filling)
description: Delia shows you how to bake a perfect sponge cake with a creamy passion fruit filling.Equipment: You will also need two 8 inch (20 cm) 1½ inch (4 cm) deep sponge tins, lightly greased and the bases lined with silicone paper (parchment).
ingredients: a little sifted icing sugar, for dusting
